label: Bifurcation of 24 pins into 12+12 chiral sets
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Use registry values
b3 = reg.b3  # 24

# Shadow-A/B parity: 24 = 12_L + 12_R
shadowA = b3 // 2  # 12 (left-handed)
shadowB = b3 // 2  # 12 (right-handed)
assert shadowA + shadowB == b3, "Shadow parity violated"
result = shadowA + shadowB == b3  # True
note: Gate 6: Left/right potential balanced at source
